name: Splash It!
description:
It's all about the splash! You have to move the boat with the all-mighty splash and collect the coins. 

Remember - stay away from the vortex!

You can play with a friend (local co-op) or with both hands (singleplayer).

Controls
  • Player 1
    • Press [W] to move up
    • Press [S] to move down
    • Press [Q] to splash!
  • Player 2
    • Press [O] to move up
    • Press [K] to move down
    • Press [P] to splash!
Created by
  • Michał Biernat
  • Anna Hosumbek

This game is our submission to Mini Jam 48: Teamwork
